prod_short_desc: Swoop in with Batman™ and take on the Joker™!
prod_long_desc:
Suit up and join Batman™ and Robin™ as they battle The Joker™ with an Easy to Build Batwing jet, featuring shooting functions in the wings, the Joker’s wacky hotrod, plus a Batcave with docking for the Batwing, jail cell and a control center. This fun construction toy set includes a simple guide to build and play, with bigger starter pieces to help build confidence in younger children. Includes 3 minifigures.
Includes Batman™, The Joker™ and Robin™ minifigures.
Features the Batcave with viewscreen and integrated docking for the Batwing, small jail with opening door, plus a control center, as well as space for the grappling hook gun and Batarang, which can be attached to the Batcave.
Also includes the Batwing jet with shooting functions in the wings and an open cockpit, plus The Joker's hotrod with flame elements and a ball and chain element.
Connect the jail and control center to the launchpad any way you like.
Set the Batwing jet on top of the control center to dock it in the Batcave.
Push the discs through the disc shooters on the wings to launch them at The Joker™.
Use the grappling hook gun to hook onto The Joker’s mallet and take it away.
Includes Easy to Build models with bigger pieces and Quick-Start bases, plus a simple guide to get children building and playing quickly.
LEGO® Juniors sets are fully compatible with all other LEGO sets.
Weapons include Robin's grappling hook gun and The Joker’s mallet.
Accessory elements include 3 Batdiscs, a Batarang and 2 sets of dynamite.
This fun construction toy is an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7.
Batcave measures over 5” high, 6” wide and 3” long.
Batwing jet measures over 1” high, 6” long and 6” wide.
The Joker's hotrod measures over 2” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
